ygData.subject: RE: What about the lvl 24 song?
ygData.msgSnippet: Amen :) Two best things in this game... fishing, and gnome kabobs ... Tani 18th Bard Halana 50th Shaman Solusek Ro ... From: Perhaps a Princess...
ygData.messageBody:
Amen :)
Two best things in this game... fishing, and gnome kabobs ...

Tani 18th Bard
Halana 50th Shaman
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 10:35 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] What about the lvl 24 song?


From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>

>> Hey! Who says fishing isn't worth the time spent on it?
>> All of my characters do fishing as a major pasttime of their lives!
>> Fish sell for 2s each! And when you fish up sandals (Meara is still
>> wearing Tattered Sandals she fished up), fish scales (Water Breathing
>> anyone?) and Rusty daggers, they don't even use a lure up!

>And if you spent the same time killing mobs you'd probably come out with
>more cash and more exp for the same time spent. Fishing at low levels is
>only worth the time spent on it if you put an extremely low value on
>your time.

So? I get SICK of running around killing mobs all the time. Sometimes I
like to be calm, not worry about dying, interact with other people. This
is not, for me, a game that is all about leveling, and leveling alone.
Otherwise, why would my highest character only be 19 when I started her
back on May 8?

I didn't say that fishing was the most efficient use of your time. (it is
one of the safest. I have never been killed while fishing) But then, neither
is running to Kelethin from Qeynos at level 7 to buy your level 8 song -->
and
then having to go back at 11 to get that song as well. However, I know
a level 50 bard who can't find her way around Rivervale -- not even to
the bank. I don't have any characters near that, but I can give you all the
directions there you want -- including where to find shurikens.

How many level 8 characters go deep into the Third Gate of Neriak? Level 9s
in Solusek A? How do you think Meara got her last name of "Daring" :)

That same level 50 bard can't find her way across the Rathe Mountains. I
can't quite give other people directions yet, but I can run through without
a map. There are many many things to do in Everquest that do not involve
getting the optimal ratio between time spent and experience received.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 19 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow)
